name: Black Sticker & Air Freshener Combo Pack
description:
COMBO PACK

We're all about giving this end, and as a load of you seemed to be buying both a sticker pack and air-fresheners we thought a discounted combo pack would be right up your street. 

COLOUR: Black sticker/freshener white print 

STICKER SIZES: Small: approx w/ 100mm x h/ 90mm. Large: approx w/ 158mm x h/ 138mm

PACK CONTAINS: 2x black stickers, 2x black cherry air fresheners

name: 4oz Premium Wheel Wax
description:
Our Premium (High Temperature) Wheel Wax contains a unique blend of the highest grade, organically harvested, high-temperature waxes, plus natural plant and nut oils. It was developed over a 12 months period and produced to offer protection for all wheel types against brake dust, road grim and to help prevent pitting. 

FEATURES:
* High-temp waxes intended to work under the toughest of conditions
* Produced using all natural ingredients and organically harvest waxes
* Produced, bottled and labelled by hand in the UK
* Bubblegum scented

DIRECTIONS: Once wheels have been cleaned using one of our Premium Wheel Cleaners sparingly apply a thin layer of wax over wheel face, allow to cure for 15 minutes (DO NOT ALLOW TO DRY), buff gently leaving a deep gloss and protective layer. For optimum coverage and protection repeat process

TOP TIP: Before application we always suggest you use in conjunction with one of our Premium Wheel Cleaners

NOTE: Store in a cool dark place away from sunlight

APPROVED: Rotiform Wheels, California, USA

RECOMMENDED: Rob Tomlin at Supercar Detailing (www.supercardetailing.com) & Bradley Scott-Stevens at BlueChip Detail (bluechipdetail.co.uk)

PRODUCED: Developed exclusively for us by Kleen Freak to our own unique blend

WARNING: Do not use if you have a nut allergy. Do not ingest. Keep away from children and pets. Consult doctor immediately if consumed

name: 500ml Mild Detoxing Wheel Cleaner
description:
Our flagship Mild Detoxing (pH Balanced) Wheel Cleaner was developed specifically to be used on wheels with stainless-steel or bare metal surfaces. This acid-free product is made using a unique bend of natural oils with natural optical brighteners and anti-corrosive properties for use on all wheels but specifically multi-piece wheels with a stainless or bare metal surface. For added protection against road grim and pitting we suggest you use in conjunction with our Premium (High Temperature) Wheel Wax. 

FEATURES:
* pH Balanced formula for stainless steel or bare metal surfaces
* Produced (using all natural ingredients), bottled and labelled by hand in the UK
* Bubblegum scented
* Adjustable nozzle for fine-tuned application

RECOMMENDED BY: Rob Tomlin at Supercar Detailing (www.supercardetailing.com) & Bradley Scott-Stevens at BlueChip Detail (www.bluechipdetail.co.uk)

PRODUCED BY: Developed exclusively for us by Kleen Freak to our own unique blend

DIRECTIONS: For best results spray onto cool wheels, allow to soak into surface, remove with pressure washer, stubborn dirt may need to be agitated, rinse thoroughly

WARNING: Always test on a small inconspicuous area of the wheel before use. Do not ingest. Keep away from children and pets. Consult doctor immediately if consumed. Avoid contact with eyes and skin

name: 500ml Heavy Hitting Wheel Cleaner
description:
Our Heavy Hitting (Acid Free) Wheel Cleaner was developed specifically to be used on wheels with a clear-coated or lacquered surface. The detergent-based product is made using a unique bend of natural oils with natural optical brighteners and anti-corrosive properties which is strong enough to break through the toughest of road grim but will still be kind to your wheels*. For added protection against road grim and pitting we suggest you use in conjunction with our Premium (High Temperature) Wheel Wax.

FEATURES:
* Acid free formula for clear-coated or lacquered surfaces
* Produced, bottled and labelled by hand in the UK
* Bubblegum scented
* Adjustable nozzle for fine-tuned application

APPROVED BY: Rotiform Wheels, California, USA

RECOMMENDED BY: Rob Tomlin at Supercar Detailing (www.supercardetailing.com) & Bradley Scott-Stevens at BlueChip Detail (www.bluechipdetail.co.uk)

PRODUCED BY: Developed exclusively for us by Kleen Freak to our own unique blend

*NOTE: Not to be used on bare metal or stainless steel surfaces (for this use our Mild Detoxing pH balanced cleaner)

DIRECTIONS: For best results spray onto cool wheels, allow to soak into surface, remove with pressure washer, stubborn dirt may need to be agitated, rinse thoroughly

WARNING: Always test on a small inconspicuous area of the wheel before use. Do not ingest. Keep away from children and pets. Consult doctor immediately if consumed. Avoid contact with eyes and skin
